trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ponce
There were no other sightings in Ponce on or around January 7th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsin the night two sphere in the sky parallel move slowly in ponce area less 2000 ft move in one moment one to north and other south and the light off and on and other big red ball with fire move in the same area many days after.many people see and the airplane move around big red ball fire. this big ball red fire move in zig zag and stop more the 20 minute and move again to the south west slowly and repeat the same one hour later. and repeat the same other days.
